mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userName, userId, userPassword, userEmail, userPhone, userPoint, userGrade, userRegDate, userStatus) VALUES (#{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userPoint}, #{userGrade}, now(), #{userStatus});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT userId FROM user WHERE username = #{userName} AND userEmail = #{userEmail}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE userEmail = #{userEmail}
